decision_conditions: Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered hand-drawn proposed plan Received: 14/09/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - A splay of 2.4m x 2.4m shall be provided on each side of the access, the depth measured from the back of the footway and the widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wall or other obstruction to visibility exceeding 0.6m in height above the surface of the adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of such splays.

Condition : 5 - Before the development is first brought into use, a front boundary wall 600mm high in grey stone or red sandfaced brickwork shall be erected to the front elevation of the garden on both sides of the vehicle access for the full width of the frontage and shall be permanently retained thereafter.
description: Formation of a vehicular access to the front of the house
